duck: Crime prevention - Crime prevention is the attempt to reduce victimization and to deter crime and criminals.
Prevention (album), an album by Scottish band De Rosa
Hazard prevention, the process of risk study and elimination and mitigation in emergency management
prevention definition: the act of preventing or hindering.
Prevent (campaign), an anti-radicalization program in the United Kingdom
Preventive Medicine (journal) - Preventive Medicine is a peer-reviewed medical journal published by Elsevier since 1972.

Pollution prevention - Pollution prevention Pollution prevention describes activities that reduce the amount of pollution generated by a process, whether it is consumer consumption, driving, or industrial production.
Prevention (magazine), a magazine about health in the United States
Preventive medicine - Preventive medicine or preventive care refers to measures taken to prevent diseases, (or injuries) rather than curing them or treating their symptoms.
Prevention-to avoid doing; stay away from dangerous or risky things.

milestones: NRA official suggests arming teachers to prevent school shootings
China kills suspected terrorists, prevents 'air disaster'
Norway takes action to prevent a possible bird flu epidemic
Vitamin C can help prevent cancer say the National Institutes of Health
Wine cork prevents fuel leak on train
Pandora radio to prevent access from outside U.S.
EU regulation prevents sale of 'small' kiwi fruit in Bristol shop
Ten-year-old computer glitch prevents delivery of 1,380 Canadian health results
Law will delay University of Minnesota strike
Law Will Prevent Strike On 1st Day Of 'U of M' Classes
Internet security firm to donate revenue to charity after Anonymous protest of Westboro Baptist Church
Pentagon announces end to ban on women in combat
Virginia Governor commutes 1,000th US execution
Virginia Governor Prevents 1,000th US Execution
Montserrat refugees to be deported from U.S.
Space Shuttle Endeavour lands in California
Collision of Challenger-60 and Boeing-757 prevented in Moscow sky
UN report says death of Benazir Bhutto preventable; fault of government
Italian court overturns law preventing trial of Prime Minister Berlusconi
Babies on U.S. no-fly lists holding up passengers
US Senator Rand Paul blocks synthetic marijuana legislation

wiki.text:
Prevention-to avoid doing; stay away from dangerous or risky things.

'Prevention' may refer to:

;General safety
* Crime prevention
* Hazard prevention, the process of risk study and elimination and mitigation in
  emergency management
* Pollution prevention
* Preventive maintenance
* Risk prevention
* Risk management

;Health and medicine
* Preventive medicine
* ''Preventive Medicine'' (journal), a peer-reviewed medical journal
* [[Prevention (magazine)]], an American healthy lifestyle magazine

;Other
* prevent defense, an American football defensive alignment
* [[Prevention (album)]] (2009), an album by the Scottish indie-rock band De
  Rosa <!--* Prevent (company), a former Slovenian company - hidden at November
  2012 - what type of company? no place to direct reader at this point-->
* Prevent (campaign), an anti-radicalization program in the United Kingdom
